description: Describes Video Flow additional and extensible attributes defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Video Flow resource

bit_rate.description: Bit rate, in kilobits/second. Integer value expressed in units of 1000 bits per second, rounding up.

components.description: Array of objects describing the components, or color (sub-)sampling, for coded video Flows. Identical to the components attribute defined for raw video Flows in AMWA IS-04.

width.description: Width of this component in pixels

height.description: Height of this component in pixels

bit_depth.description: Number of bits used to describe each sample
